article_title: Demopolis Police Searching for Missing Woman
article_text:
The Demopolis Police Department is searching for a woman who disappeared this weekend.

Police say Maggie Lean Wright was last seen leaving the Demopolis Civic Center on Saturday night. She was last seen wearing black pants with pin stripes, a black shirt, and a long black trench coat.

If you have any information about Wright, you can contact the Demopolis Police Department at 334-289-3073.

article_metadata.description: Authorities in West Alabama are asking for the public's help in finding a woman who disappeared over the weekend.
article_metadata.author: Chip Scarborough
